indian_food.name: Butter Chicken
indian_food.description: A popular North Indian dish made with marinated chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce.

indian_food.name: Palak Paneer
indian_food.description: A vegetarian dish from North India made with paneer (cottage cheese) and spinach.

indian_food.name: Samosas
indian_food.description: A popular Indian snack consisting of a crispy pastry shell filled with spiced potatoes, peas, and sometimes meat.

indian_food.name: Chole Bhature
indian_food.description: A Punjabi dish consisting of spicy chickpeas (chole) served with a fluffy deep-fried bread (bhature).

indian_food.name: Dosa
indian_food.description: A South Indian crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter, often served with chutney and sambar.

indian_food.name: Vada Pav
indian_food.description: A popular street food from Mumbai consisting of a potato fritter (vada) served in a bread roll (pav).

indian_food.name: Rogan Josh
indian_food.description: A Kashmiri dish made with lamb in a rich and aromatic tomato-based sauce.

indian_food.name: Gulab Jamun
indian_food.description: A sweet dessert made from milk solids (khoya) and flour, served in a sugar syrup.
